title: The Friendly Wedding - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage of Convenience   Modern Day   Seduction
author: FrustratedGirlWriter
description: A man-hater named Sapphire married a super ‘friendly’ guy named Johann for the sake of getting her inheritance. The two of them get along. She exempted him from her wrath against men. This is because they are ‘Friends’. Until almost every day he was always topless inside their house. She also noticed that he was ‘flirting’ with her. But he only said, “I’m not flirting with you. No malice, please. We’re friends.”>
